tasks.title: CRITICAL: Refactor all code examples to use Anthropic SDK
tasks.description: All code examples must use @anthropic-ai/sdk or @anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk. Current ch03 examples (prompt-patterns.ts, few-shot-builder.ts, prompt-analyzer.ts) are standalone utility functions without SDK integration. Refactor to show real API usage patterns. Every example should demonstrate: 1) Importing the SDK, 2) Creating a client/session, 3) Making actual API calls. Delete or rewrite examples that are just helper functions.

tasks.title: Add Level 2 thinking content
tasks.description: Document the three levels of systems thinking: Level 1 (endpoint listing - 'I need POST /users, GET /users/:id'), Level 2 (entity-relationship thinking - 'I have Users, Products, Orders with CRUD and relationships'), Level 3 (bounded contexts with invariants, contracts, failure modes). Add to appropriate chapter (ch01 or ch03).

tasks.title: Add Plan vs Execute mode documentation
tasks.description: Document Claude Code's plan mode vs execute mode. Plan mode: claude -p with /plan command, creates implementation plan before execution. Execute mode: direct implementation. Add to ch02 (Getting Started) or ch12 (Development Workflows).
